Paired Weapons. Attuning to this weapon attunes you to @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.NX7isQ4eMbOLYTVK]{Feather}. They share an attunement slot. However, loci are attached to each individual item and only affect that item's rarity.

Locate Prey. When the attuned deals damage to a creature with Talon they may choose to place it under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLocateCrea]{Locate Creature} spell (requires concentration)

Soar (requires expertise in Survival). As an action while attuned to @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.NX7isQ4eMbOLYTVK]{Feather} and Talon, as long as either weapon is on their person, the attuned can grant themselves a flying speed equal to 60 feet. If they already have a flying speed then they can increase that speed by an additional 30 feet instead. The duration of this flight is equal to a number of minutes equal to a Survival (Wisdom) check. You must be conscious to benefit from this movement and you can end it early at any time (no action required). You can use this property a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

Foundry Note

When you attune to this item, if you only have proficiency with Survival then change the Magical Bonus on the Details page to 2, if you have expertise with Survival then change it to 3. Additionally, you may need to update the normal and long ranges of the weapon according to the table above.
